name: Portland OR Student Problem-Solver Classroom Management Workshop
content: With the Student Problem-Solver Classroom Management Workshop, you'll leave with hundreds of new strategies for all the problems that you've encountered in the classroom. You will leave with solutions for poor motivation, bad attitudes, violence, dropping out, at risk kids and more. For more information, visit our website https://youthchg.com, or via email (dwells@youthchg.com), or call toll-free to 1-800-545-5736.
